Text: Another 80 #Covid19 patients have recovered and are being discharged. 17 are from Puri16 from Kendrapara 16 from Malkangiri7 from Cuttack 3 each from Nayagarh, Sonepur, Sundargarh, Keonjhar and Jharsuguda2 each from Ganjam, Kandhamal ; Khurda. (1/2)

The @WHO has released findings of how health services for #NCDs have been impacted by #COVID19. "An important way to control NCDs is to focus on reducing the risk factors associated with these diseases." @WHO #BeatNCDs https://t.co/Yu77yCijby

12 doctors in GP have died from Covid1911 were BAMEAs we grieve for another of our colleagues, the promised report on the disproportionate impact on the virus on BAME is being witheld - is there something to hide?

Trump walked to the church that rioters tried to burn down last night and held up a Bible. Predictably, some are losing their minds. If he hadn't acknowledged the church burning, they'd criticize him for that, too. Good grief.

earlier i biked from union square to barclays / atlantic center - passed at least 2 dozen groups of 25+ copsnot a single mask 😷 every single protestor gathering was wearing a maski guess #COVID19 quarantines are over? https://t.co/bMKXzzHuQJ

Law ; Order in Philadelphia, NOW! They are looting stores. Call in our great National Guard like they FINALLY did (thank you President Trump) last night in Minneapolis. Is this what voters want with Sleepy Joe? All Dems!

It's my bad though. The way America mishandled Covid-19 should have been enough to radicalize every single one of us. But, that was a relatively slow burn. Donald Trump just declared war on us. That will do it. Expeditiously.
